metadata.title: CVE-2024-35845 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:iwlwifi: dbg-tlv: ensure NUL termination The iwl_fw_ini_debug_info_tlv isused as a string, so we must ensure the string is terminated correctlybefore using it.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
